title: SWITCHING TO SAMSUNG GALAXY S7
description: Samsung Galaxy S7 (Unlocked) -   Is the Samsung Galaxy S7 the perfect smartphone? I'll be using it for at least the next two weeks in an effort to find out. Initial impressions are good. The Galaxy S7 is incredibly comfortable to hold, the camera looks great and performance is snappy. At this point Samsung appears tough to beat in the Android world. Which would you go for, the Galaxy S7 or S7 Edge?  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
